title: Face with Monocle
description:
A yellow face with furrowed eyebrows wearing a monocle. Usually depicted with a small, intent frown and head slightly upturned, as if in careful inspection.

May show that someone is pondering, considering, or questioning something, sometimes with a sense of skeptical or ironic observation or encouraging a closer look at some content. May convey a sense of sophistication or smug intelligence, e.g., smarty-pants.
apple_vendor_description: This discerning face-with-monocle emoji on Apple devices presents a character with a sophisticated and slightly amused expression, framed by a neatly styled eyebrow and a prominent monocle.  Apple's design language gives it a refined 3D appearance, with smooth gradients and realistic lighting that highlight the subtle contours of the face and the polished gleam of the monocle.  It's often used to convey a sense of scrutiny, cleverness, or a thoughtful, analytical perspective in digital exchanges.
